channel.title: Network As-Built on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS
channel.description: Recent content in Network As-Built on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS

item.title: QField for Fibre and Telecommunication Networks
item.description:
What you can do

  • Plan trench routes and equipment locations
  • Collect as-builts with attributes and photos
  • Sync changes and comments via QFieldCloud

Works with QGIS and QFieldCloud

One workflow from office planning to field execution and back, without data loss.
